overlayHeading: 🏆 ChannelMaestro Pairs Leaderboard - last full days - {currency}
description:
Daily automated backtests of 45 pairs per currency, selected for top performance on 24h volume, trades count and price change. 
Using ChannelMaestro as strategy, with 1/5/15 chart timeframes. Full stats and settings available in detailed views per pair.
